name: Gunpowder Temple of Haven
description: Rolled leaves explode into a refreshing green-yellow brew.

name: Assam Dimakusi
description: A dark, malty, strong broken leaf tea.

name: Silver Needles Jun Shan
description: This very rare tea is the result of two days picking each year. This is the finest quality, most delicate tea on the planet. You are in the company of past emperors while you enjoy this tea.
